website_summaries.verdict: Sure, these surfboard travel bags may sport a simple design, but they are surprisingly effective at keeping your board safe and make hauling it to and from the beach nearly effortless.
pros: Long and comfortable padded carrying handle
cons: Aluminum foil silver is the only color option offered

customer_reviews.title: No single fin zipper.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a mini log. It was confusing as the pic shown a fin zipper, but my bag don’t hv one. It’s a tight fit with three fins, and it’s gonna be real tight with the bigger single fin. I also bought a 7’6” Cruve a yr ago and the padding is thicker, but this is the only 7’ mini log bag that I could find So oh well.
customer_reviews.author: SwagMom

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the bag except for the amount of padding. I know it's just a day bag but it should have a bit more padding to protect from heat and bumps when transporting the board from home to the beach and back. I have used it several times and I can say it keeps my board very cool even in the hot sun.
customer_reviews.author: 808 Illustrator

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: First, I gave them a 1 star review because somehow there was a technical issue (I received a 10' bag instead of 8' bag). However, the seller immediately contacted me and resolved with this issue with sincere apology. Having said that, if you are a regular surfer and looking for a surfboard bag to protect your surfboard but do not want to spend crazy amount of money for it, this is it. You cannot find any better deal than this one. Price is perfect. Efficiency is even better. Zippers have no issues and the fin zip works perfectly fine. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Shin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one because it’s around $10 cheaper than others brand... but I found it’s really cheaply made and smelly... It looks like similar with other brand.. but if you look in detail... the material is just like plastic bags. It’s also much thinner than other brand. Not deserve this much $ at all! I have 5 boards with different shape and size and also bought different bags. This one is the most disappointing one even if $10 cheaper. Should be around half price to make it deserve.
customer_reviews.author: Lew

customer_reviews.title: A good bargain
customer_reviews.text: It's a good basic board bag. I wouldn't recommend it for serious travel but it keeps the sun away and has enough padding to be good for carefully handled car travel and rack storage. The price is right. If you need a bag for serious travel, get one that has denser padding and more of it. The padding on this bag is minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick T. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to measure your board
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful good quality bag, unfortunately my paddleboard is a solid one with a kayak material and it was too thick. I would’ve kept it but tried driving around with it on my roof and it created a parachute effect. Easy communication w/the co. and fast refund.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Reliable SUP Board case
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love our SUP bag. Sizing was spot on. Design fun and lightweight. Easy to carry and provided light padding between the board and mounts as well. Great protection from the elements particularly if you need to store your board outside.
customer_reviews.author: House Stargaryen

customer_reviews.title: 10' Board Bag is not 10'!
customer_reviews.text: The board bag looks to be very well made just not for my 9'10" Lonboard! The Bag is not 10' as advertised its more like 9'9" on the outside from tip to tip and it is super wide so this product really should be catered more for an SUP not longer than 9'6" What I need is a Longboard day bag to hold a board that is 9'10" long.
customer_reviews.author: William Newkirk

customer_reviews.title: Great bag - very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great board bag and well worth the price. It fits my 9’0” Walden longboard beautifully and will be perfect for protecting the board on my car roof racks on road trips.
customer_reviews.author: Surfer23451

customer_reviews.title: Was able to strap to roof for travel...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed and a good value compared to much others available. Perfect for storage
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Great cover go for it
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and went ahead and ordered even though there were some negative reviews. I did not find the negative reviews to be the case. I love the panel board cover it is nice and cushiony fits my paddleboard perfect I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Jane from Maine

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag!
customer_reviews.text: I own several bags by South Bay, I like them, they are well designed, made of good materials, light and comfortable over the shoulder. This particular bag I use for an R-Series Almond Joy, it fits very nicely, snug all around but with plenty of space, good price and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Delany F Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: WRONG SIZES ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t order the correct size the first time. My bad. I sent them back. Reordered two 10ftx30in bags so I thought. When new ones came the width wasn’t correct. What was advertised as 30in. wide was actually 28in and 27in wide bags. Arranged to have those returned too. Not ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Maria Worley

customer_reviews.title: Well padded, solid construction. Great bag.
customer_reviews.text: Solid bag, well padded, good carrying ability with handle and strap. Also small compartment inside to keep wax. Heavy duty zippers, should last for years. Everything you would want in a surfboard bag.
customer_reviews.author: Line - L

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a deal on a board bag, however my 9' board bag I bought from South Bay Board Co. deteriorated within weeks of me using the board bag. By far the worst board bag I have ever purchased in my 20 years of surfing.
customer_reviews.author: Josh R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice and roomy and well built. Jury is out on the bungee cord but it can be removed. Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: KrakowKid

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Not the fanciest, but covers and protects my stick like I need it to. Cheeehoo🤙🏽🏄🏽‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: mbarry

customer_reviews.title: 11 ft.  SUP bag
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the money. Like having the reflective material on both sides. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Mauisol

customer_reviews.title: Basic Cover - but works absolutely fine.  9ft 6" RED Compact iSUP fitted in the 10 ft bad.
customer_reviews.text: Basic Cover - but works absolutely fine. 9ft 6" RED Compact iSUP fitted in the 10 ft bad.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: traveling with an indo yoga board
customer_reviews.text: I needed a container for my indo yoga board. The surfboard bag is the perfect size. I have not seen how it handles the baggage handlers, but, I am optimistic it will do great. There is ample room for the board and the 'cushions'.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great bag with even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality bag for your board. Well worth the money. Even better, though, is the customer service from the company. I had a small issue with my bag and the company immediately made everything right.
customer_reviews.author: L M

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for transportation to the beach/storage
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the price. Not as sturdy as I had hoped but it is a great bag for storage and transporting boards to the beach and back. This company also had great customer service and I want to give them props for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Be advised: 7 ft board with thrusters just barely fits in 7 ft bag. Good quality and durable. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice width to fit most boards. "Padding" very thin. Shoulder strap not comfy. Glorified dust cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great bag. Bungee cords work great to hold wet suits and towels allowing them to air dry. Great customer service as well if there are any questions or issues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for our 14 year old. It is good quality and good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved board from damage!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and exactly as described. Sender followed up by email. Bag already suffered a tear when board fell off the top of the car - but protected the surfboard! Fin fits in.
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Very good SUP bag (11ft sup)
customer_reviews.text: Bought a bag for my 11ft naish Nalu SUP board. Fits perfect. Great bag for the money
customer_reviews.author: brandon reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Good price and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Good price and fast delivery. Bag is just like price. I am not sure for surf trip (not strong) but you can use for keep in the shop. Shoulder straps keep falling down. I ordered because of the fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Han

product_meta.title: South Bay Board Co. - Premium Surfboard Bags & SUP Paddle Board Bags
product_meta.description: [Board Bag Spec:] : Lightweight, Dual Sided UV Reflective Surfboard Bags & Paddle Board Bag for Board Protection and Care | The Surf Bag sizes and Paddle Board Bag sizes available are 5ft, 6ft, 7ft, 8ft, 9ft, 10ft, & 11ft | Designed with Heavy Use Intentions, combined with extra Durable, High Quality Materials = The Best Value Surfboard Bags and Paddle Board Bags available on the market. [Board Bag Design] : Each Surfboard Bag & Paddle Board Bag features built-in comfortable carrying handle and shoulder strap for easy transportation | Un-Zip Bag Expansion system for extra storage to hold the board with fins on or throw in your wetsuit and towel | UV, Heat, Water repelling White tarpaulin material on both sides of the board bag | An XL Front Pocket for more storage of gear | 1/5” Foam Protective Layer built into top, sides, and bottom fo bag | Durable sand resistant zippers [Board Bag Purchase Includes] : (1) Surfboard Bag or Paddleboard Bag in your selected size [Specific Board Bag Dimensions] : 5’ Surfboard Bag = 61” x 24” Wide ||| 6' Surfboard Bag = 73” long x 24” wide ||| 7' Surfboard Bag = 85” long x 25” wide ||| 8' Surfboard Bag = 97” long x 25” wide ||| 9' Surfboard Bag = 109” long x 25” wide ||| 10’ Surfboard Bag = 120” long x 30” wide ||| 11' Paddle Board Bag = 133” long x 33” wide [100% Satisfaction Guarantee] : Use your Board Bag Risk Free and Love it for 30 days or Return it (re-stocking Fee Applies) | We keep returns easy and handle your shipping need. | We firmly believe our Surfboard Day Bags and Paddle Board Day Bags are of the best Quality, Durability, Design, & Value on the market. | We use our board bags all the time, they do an incredible job of making storing and moving the board bag safe and easy!
feature_bullets: [Board Bag Spec:] : Lightweight, Dual Sided UV Reflective Surfboard Bags & Paddle Board Bag for Board Protection and Care | The Surf Bag sizes and Paddle Board Bag sizes available are 5ft, 6ft, 7ft, 8ft, 9ft, 10ft, & 11ft | Designed with Heavy Use Intentions, combined with extra Durable, High Quality Materials = The Best Value Surfboard Bags and Paddle Board Bags available on the market.

[Board Bag Design] : Each Surfboard Bag & Paddle Board Bag features built-in comfortable carrying handle and shoulder strap for easy transportation | Un-Zip Bag Expansion system for extra storage to hold the board with fins on or throw in your wetsuit and towel | UV, Heat, Water repelling White tarpaulin material on both sides of the board bag | An XL Front Pocket for more storage of gear | 1/5” Foam Protective Layer built into top, sides, and bottom fo bag | Durable sand resistant zippers
[Board Bag Purchase Includes] : (1) Surfboard Bag or Paddleboard Bag in your selected size

[Specific Board Bag Dimensions] : 5’ Surfboard Bag = 61” x 24” Wide ||| 6' Surfboard Bag = 73” long x 24” wide ||| 7' Surfboard Bag = 85” long x 25” wide ||| 8' Surfboard Bag = 97” long x 25” wide ||| 9' Surfboard Bag = 109” long x 25” wide ||| 10’ Surfboard Bag = 120” long x 30” wide ||| 11' Paddle Board Bag = 133” long x 33” wide

[100% Satisfaction Guarantee] : Use your Board Bag Risk Free and Love it for 30 days or Return it (re-stocking Fee Applies) | We keep returns easy and handle your shipping need. | We firmly believe our Surfboard Day Bags and Paddle Board Day Bags are of the best Quality, Durability, Design, & Value on the market. | We use our board bags all the time, they do an incredible job of making storing and moving the board bag safe and easy!
